Get a vps for only $5/month, Honduras and New Jersey locations available. OpenVZ virtualization with your choice of Linux Distro, between CentOS, Ubuntu, Debian and CloudLinux.

>2 cpu cores

>30GB HDD

>768 MB RAM

>1000 GB Bandwidth

>100 Mbit port

>1 dedicated ip

Control panels available at an additional cost, both Cpanel and Plesk. Plans are scalable to fit your needs. Visit our website for more information http://laceibanetsociety.com/en/vps-services/openvz-vps/
